name: The Locker Rooms: Chapter 2 Early Access
name_original: The Locker Rooms: Chapter 2 Early Access
description: This game starts off where TheLockerRooms : Chapter 1 ends. You have fallen down a hole and meet a rather shiny ghost. You do not know if it is an angel but being a paranormal investigator your interest is spiked and you decide to follow the ghost.
